By GoldenBoy on Monday, December 29, 2003 - 05:32 pm:

BIG Cleanup
Great work so far folks!!
Since everything seemed updated, and there is some confusion about what we are still looking for, I decided to Wipe out most everything except for these few posts that have important info.

Goals and things to look for:

More traits. I don't think we have all of them yet, and things to watch for are monsters from CD, and the results of combinations. While I don't think trait combining will be as interesting as it was in MRA, I wouldn't be surprised to see some advanced traits come up when we learn more about what makes good combos.

Adventure traits. Not only are there several breeds not yet reported, I really think getting the levels these traits are earned at into the table is usefuls stuff. Keep them coming.

So remember, take a look at

Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): FAQ: Monster Trait Lists

and compare what we have with what you have.
Also keep an eye when you adventure and mark down what levels your monsters earn those Searches and Rides.
